website_summaries.verdict: A side-mount heavy-duty backyard tire swing with a practical design.
pros: Chains are all rubber-coated for protection against pinching
Made with a real rubber tire
Can hold a decent amount of kid weight
Swing is well made with good hardware
cons: This tire swing is made from a real tire material, which may leave black marks on hands and clothing

customer_reviews.title: Absolute disgust, should be banned from amazon
customer_reviews.text: Literally had what appears to be a used heavily oiled car tire delivered to my door with a chain. What a joke. Do you really think that I can just set this up and let my kids play on this? I can’t even get the oil off my hand from opening the package let alone let my kids ruin their clothes. I’m at complete and literal disgust at what I just paid for. 80 dollars for someone’s used tire. I would have been better off buying a new tire for my own car and drilling holes in my own. Please do not buy this product. Absolutely absurd and this should be banned from amazon. WOW. This is sad
customer_reviews.author: Nick wilson

customer_reviews.title: Just like childhood old way easier!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tire swing! I am not a handy person and was able to assemble it with no issue even with my kids hopping around me in excitement. Love that it's a recycled tire, just like the old fashion swings. Hung it from a sturdy branch with a swivel and my kids have been playing with it almost non stop. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Dean Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Heavy...but a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It is a real tire. It is heavy and it is dirty. You need to wash it thoroughly before you hang it. The chains are heavy duty. The plastic coating on the lower portion is continuous and goes up high enough to prevent pinches to small hands even when the child fully extends her arms. I bought this for my 4 year old grand daughter. Again, it is heavy. Careful consideration should be given to the limb from which you intend to hang the tire. When you wash off the tire, you can easily find the top three holes intended for hanging.
customer_reviews.author: OK GrAnnie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install, four holes in the tire go to the bottom for draining water, three smaller holes up top for mounting the chains. Just push the bolt through the small holes in the tire and lock it in with a washer and nut and your loggin. Holds 180LBS person just fine. I used the selware swing 1200LB swivel hook and it works great. 10/10 would recommend you wash it before you use it to prevent oil stains. Your gonna need three small clips/carabineers to hook the top part of the chain to your swing mount.
customer_reviews.author: Heltemes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy
customer_reviews.text: Great swing, very easy to install and sturdy. Comes with everything needed. We used a carabiner hook and a hammock strap to attach to our tree.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Real Tire
customer_reviews.text: This is a real used tire. It was clean, still had some tread, no visible damage. Chains are nicely coated. They put mounting holes in top and bottom. The bottom holes act as drains so it never fills with water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Question about product.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package there were 3 chains, but no snap hooks. That’s fine because I can buy snap hooks separately. What is odd is that there are 4 holes drilled in the tire for the 3 chains. The are equidistant from each other. I thought originally I was supposed to get 4 chains, but I’m looking at the product photo, and there are 3 chains. Why 4 holes in the tire and not 3? Can I get an extra chain?
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bornemann

customer_reviews.title: To be continued
customer_reviews.text: Have not used yet and won’t for another couple months but looks great! Will update review once we install
customer_reviews.author: Amellia Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Strong and comfortable for 3! You need to purchase materials to use if hanging from a tree
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty product, confusing chain mount
customer_reviews.text: Great product I am sure we will have for years, but I initially thought it had wrong amount of holes (4) for a 3 chain swing. You need to flip it to the opposite side and closely look to realize that there are 3 holes on the other side that need pushed out (the rubber core is still there). Directions in the box would've been helpful as I almost returned it defective until I realized the correct side for the chains.
customer_reviews.author: GK22

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and was as advertised. I wish they added in one more chain. There are four holed in the tire, but only three chains. Having only three allows the tire to turn which the kids like, so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: EZ

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly,  loads of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are absolutely in love with there tire swing, we have ours hanging from a tree with tree straps also ordered from AMAZON. They both work great together and my boys spend lots of time on it <3
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: It’s a tire so it’s tough. Nice thick coating on chains. Should last forever if someone doesn’t steal it!
customer_reviews.author: kmann62

customer_reviews.title: Not balanced
customer_reviews.text: Tire is suppose to have 3 even spaced holes. It came with 4 even space hole so it won’t balance. Also, I was under the impression hardware would come with it.
customer_reviews.author: je

customer_reviews.title: Can't count to 3?
customer_reviews.text: 4 holes equally apart ..only 3 chains. There is not holes on the other side as one reviewer said... Really, what kind of quality control does it take to count up to 3?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids would swing for hours on this tire swing if we let them! It is very durable & strong enough for several kids or a child/adult together. The coating on the durable chains prevents pinching, which is a well thought out detail. It even has predrilled drainage holes. We mounted it using a 360 degree swivel hangar. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is one awesome tire swing. Got it for the grand-kids and I have a blast on it too. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barbi

customer_reviews.title: Set up easy. Hangs straight works fine
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with all parts ( carabiners ) were missing . Tire was slick . Had to be cleaned with a degreaser . Set up easy . Hangs straight works fine .
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire Swing for the Kids
customer_reviews.text: The tire is sturdy enough that rambunctious children can have fun twisting and swinging on this tire swing. All parts were present and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality made & happy kids!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with quality of hardware supplied and a real tire. My children who are 8 & 6 yrs old love this swing!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zaffina

customer_reviews.title: Great tire swing
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this tire swing!! It was fairly easy to assemble and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Morin

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 4 year old grandson & he & his friends just love it! It was shipped & received in two days (we have Prime). We hung it from a very large tree in our backyard. Tire is clean & new, pretty large, (three kids his age can sit at the same time). We were a little concerned at first because of the four punch outs on one side. But like someone posted in an earlier review, if you flip it over, there are three holes much smaller holes that you attached the chains too. We're very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Tire Swing
customer_reviews.text: This tire swing is ok. It came with no instructions, which is ok since it's pretty easy to understand. However, it was coated with an oily film which came off on your hands and clothes. I was able to remove this coating with baking soda and dish detergent. It was fine once that was done.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie E. Nosotti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, Sturdy and easy to assemble. Exceeded my expectation. Grandkids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen V. Ferrero

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and sturdy for my grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like having to clean it first. Love the durability
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ashby

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 seven year old girls and they love the swing and it is big enough for both ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 seven year old girls and they love the swing and it is big enough for both to use at same time
customer_reviews.author: michael bochenek

customer_reviews.title: Large, strong tire for tire swing
customer_reviews.text: This tire swing was (and still is) a big hit in our backyard. Works great for my three kids (7, 4, and 2) - they can all ride at the same time. The tire arrived in good condition, I gave it a quick scrub with soap an I used several quick connectors (from the local hardware store) and connected it to a swivel self-locking hook, then connected the swivel hook to a second chain up to the tree branch. The plastic coating on the lower part of the chains is a nice touch, easier for the kids to hold tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew FX

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as promised and is a big hit. We ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised and is a big hit. We needed some additional hardware and it was shipped immediately after we made seller aware of our situation.
customer_reviews.author: May Dobb

customer_reviews.title: Should NOT be called "NEW" its used
customer_reviews.text: tire is used, way worn down tread side walls are like the ones on my car and Im a terrible paralell parker so you can imagine where this is going, I assumed the tire was actually new, as its being sold as "new" rather than in the used section. the chains are great, but if I knew I was getting an old tire with holes punched in it (also there were 5 holes punched in one side and 3 on the other think someone messed up and just did more......
customer_reviews.author: Hoper555

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and 10 year old granson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, strong swing. Easy to install and 10 year old granson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very strong. Holds a 300lb man easily so no issue for multiple kids. I recommend this to all.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good product - Needs swivel part
customer_reviews.text: Tire is full size truck tire. The holes were pre-drilled and required some assembly. The tire required cleaning. The product did not include a swivel, so that would need to be purchased separately. The plastic coating was well done on the chains.
customer_reviews.author: portalflight

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not all the parts and we had to re-drill
customer_reviews.text: Super excited to get a tire swing for the summer we chose this one. It took a little longer to arrive than expected. My husband had to re-drill the areas around the tire to fit the bolts in as they were uneven to allow for the three chains to sit equally apart for weight distribution - easy to do but annoying. Then it can with the bolt that goes into the tree or play set but nothing to attach the actual chains to that bolt. We had to go out and buy a heavy duty hook that connects. The quality is great the our kids love it but be prepared to assemble and possibly be missing the connection hook.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: the kids love it, it will last forever
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and durable. the kids love it, it will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: lonikay

customer_reviews.title: Look it over for Nails!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beware!!!! This arrived with 3 nails in the tire!!! Luckily my dad was washing it down & painting it, so the black wouldn't get all over all the kids clothes when he noticed the nails in the tire. I hate to think what would have happened if he hadn't found them before the kids got on the swing.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Gal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. The grandkids love it even more!
customer_reviews.author: O. J.  Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: SUPER HEAVY SWING
customer_reviews.text: SUPER HEAVY - it's exhausting to push the kids using this swing. It's really overkill for the use but is a good quality nonetheless
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Swing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with the bracket set. My 4 year old wanted a tire swing and she absolutely loves this one.
customer_reviews.author: liv2rec

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this tire swing. It got here fairly quickly
customer_reviews.author: JulesLH

customer_reviews.title: Purchased item, received it with four holes drilled. ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased item, received it with four holes drilled. Not usable because the three chains will not balance correctly. Contacted Amazon who promptly returned and replaced, replacement also has 4 holes drilled. Is it difficult to flip and drill 3 holes no, but you shouldn't have to!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Schramm-keeports

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the kids, but the chain broke with only three children on it. One problem is I can't find a proper attachment for the swing to my metal swing set without having someone weld one on.
customer_reviews.author: Msth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, but when both of my kids got on the swing to play (11 yr old & 10 yr old), one of the bolts pulled out of the tire and my husband had to drill another hole and use that. Kids love swing, but just one kid at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: tree swing
customer_reviews.text: my kids love this tire swing easy to hook up to any tree .the only thing is you have to add more chain
customer_reviews.author: BArbara jamolawicz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the swing!!! A REAL tire, with high quality chains!! My 3 year old loves it! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly LaMonica

customer_reviews.title: seems like they did not think
customer_reviews.text: 3 chains - 5 holes drilled in the tyre ... hard to evenly space the chains that way!
customer_reviews.author: Gauss

customer_reviews.title: Product is fine. Tire was clean
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine. Tire was clean. hardware is good quality. However, It came pre-drilled with 4 equally spaced holes, BUT 3 hooks?? So, I had to re-drill 2 holes to get 3 equally spaced holes. Not hard, but, I don't get it?? seems like a straight forward thing, how can it be messed up?
customer_reviews.author: WWS

customer_reviews.title: OK Product...Flimsy Packaging
customer_reviews.text: UPS just delivered this item. The tire and accessories seem to be OK, but the packaging is horrible. The box is falling apart and secured with cheap flimsy tape. It didn't even come close to being sturdy enough for a product this size and weight. It's a wonder the whole thing didn't fall apart before arriving. There is no indication that this was packaged by Amazon. The manufacturer must have sent it this way. Also the tire is obviously used. Not that it matters for what it's used for, but should have been indicated in the description. I would never purchase anything from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to Cook

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This also did not come with the hooks to put it on the swivel piece I bought
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made ripoff
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a joke! We got a dirty tire with 4 drilled holes and 3 chains. One of the chains had smaller links than the others so we had to stretch them out to go over the hook. We also had to redrill the holes to get the thing to balance. All good? Nope. Tire was covered in black grease that got all over our clothes. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Judy B.

customer_reviews.title: This item is a total joke. Used tire. ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is a total joke. Used tire. 3 chains. Pre-drilled holes. And they drilled 4 holes in a square pattern...so it won't even work with the 3 chains provided. Note the picture shows the holes in a triangle. Not on the product shipped to me.
customer_reviews.author: Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Think about it
customer_reviews.text: Here's the deal. It's actually a good quality item. It cost $160. It's a used truck tire that I could have gotten at a tire store probably for free or close to it. $10 worth of chains and $10 worth of hardware. No wonder it was free shipping. They sold me $20 worth of stuff for $160. If you have a drill and know how to use it, go to the tire shop and the hardware store
customer_reviews.author: Eric Weekly

product_meta.title: Eastern Jungle Gym Heavy-Duty 3-Chain Rubber Tire Swing Seat with Adjustable Coated Swing Chains - Swing Set Accessories
product_meta.description:
Add a totally fun activity to your backyard with the Eastern Jungle Gym 3-Chain Rubber Tire Swing! A low maintenance outdoor swing seat, this large 3-chain tire swing comes complete with three coated swing chains that are stronger than rope, designed for soft-gripping and pinch-free. The chain is coated in yellow plastisol and the rubber tire is black. This large tire swing allows enough room for three children and requires minimal assembly. The tire swing seat is pre-drilled for easy installation! There are three small holes on the top side for the swing chains and four larger holes on the bottom side for the drainage of water.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Low-maintenance high-fun comes to tire swings with this 3-Chain Tire Swing design. Swing includes commercial grade Plastisol coated straight coil swing chains that are stronger than rope, designed for soft-gripping, and "pinch-free."
feature_bullets: Tire swing fits up to three children; tire diameter is approximately 27”
Swing chains are approximately 66" long; bottom 30" of chain is coated in yellow plastisol for a soft, pinch-free grip

PLEASE READ INSTRUCTIONS: Tire Swing is pre-drilled with 3 evenly spaced small holes on the top side for the placement of swing chains and 4 larger holes on the bottom side to allow for the drainage of water. DO NOT attempt to connect the chains to the side with four holes; flip the tire over to locate the 3 smaller, holes for the connection of the swing chains.
Attaches to most swing beams up to 9' high and features 2/0 swing chains that are zinc-coated
Tire swing requires minor assembly, mounts to a wooden swing set easily with Eastern Jungle Gym's Heavy-Duty Tire Swivel (sold separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars97 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
